name: Melvin HARRIS, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Harris v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Melvin HARRIS, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 30th day of June, 2006, probable jurisdiction is noted and the Order of the Commonwealth Court is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
904 A.2d 856
Melvin HARRIS, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
No. 28 MAP 2006.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 30, 2006.
